title: Contracting classification premium program
context: [ยง431:14G-103.5] Rerating. No person, business, or entity may change or rerate any rate approved by the commissioner in any subsequent transfer, sale, resale, or pass through of health insurance issued by a managed care plan. [L 2015, c 63, ยง22]is a method of computing premiums, that does not impose a higher premium solely because of an employer&rsquo;s higher rate of wages. [L 1995, c 234, pt of ยง5]
